description: This file defines an interface (ILocalStore) for a local storage system, including methods for opening storage, creating tables, setting limits, querying entries, removing entries, and adding entries. It also includes a type alias for a shared pointer to the interface.

classes.name: ILocalStore
classes.description: An interface defining methods for local key-value storage operations.

methods.name: Open
methods.description: Opens the storage at the specified path.

methods.name: CreateTable
methods.description: Creates a new table in the storage.

methods.name: SetLimit
methods.description: Sets a limit on the number of entries in a table.

methods.name: GetEntriesCount
methods.description: Retrieves the count of entries in a table within a range.

methods.name: GetEntries
methods.description: Retrieves a list of entries from a table.

methods.name: RemoveEntries
methods.description: Removes entries from a table within a specified range.

methods.name: AddEntry
methods.description: Adds a new entry to a table.
